title: Mexico : internet penetration 2000 to 2018
summary: This is a line chart with an x axis representing Year and a y axis representing Percentage of individuals using internet, containing a total of 19 data points.
In general Percentage of individuals using internet has rose over the Year.
The most drastic increase took place within the Year 2014 and 2015.
Maximum Percentage of individuals using internet, about 65.8 was reported at Year 2018
The lowest Percentage of individuals using internet, of value 5.08 was reported at Year 2000
